Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Capital City in 1978...
Injured on 8/6/1979 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/2/1981, off Brian Dalley (PEN)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/11/1983, off Siro Delcastillo (PIL)...
Injured on 9/11/1983 with a Bruised Ankle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/19/1984 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Lynchburg on 5/26/1984...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/8/1987 to a 4-year deal worth $4,484,444 per year...
Traded from Gashouse to Plum Grove on 6/2/1989 (Going to PG: 3B J. Dziedzic, P B. Crochet, P S. Hidalgo. Going to GHG: 1B J. Diaz)...
